answer: <p>As all of the other answers have already said, it's part of ES2015 arrow function syntax. More specifically, it's not an operator, it's a punctuator token that separates the parameters from the body: <code>ArrowFunction : ArrowParameters =&gt; ConciseBody</code>. E.g. <code>(params) =&gt; { /* body */ }</code>.</p>
